## Chess.header() method

Returns PGN header information as an object.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
header(): Record<string, string>;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

Record&lt;string, string&gt;

## Example


```js
chess.header()
// -> { White: 'Morphy', Black: 'Anderssen', Date: '1858-??-??' }

```
